text: The Dark Side of the Heart () is a 1992 Argentine Canadian romantic drama movie directed by Eliseo Subiela and starring Darío Grandinetti, Sandra Ballesteros, Nacha Guevara, André Melançon, Jean Pierre Reguerraz. It is a cult classic. ==Other websites== * * The Dark Side of the Heart at Cine Nacional Category:1992 romantic drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Argentine romance movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian romance movies Category:Movies directed by Eliseo Subiela
title: The Dark Side of the Heart
